title: Hitman: Game of the Year Edition – v1.13.2
body:
Hitman: Game of the Year Edition – v1.13.2


Genres/Tags: Action, Shooter, Stealth, Third-person, 3D
Companies: IO Interactive / Square Enix
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI10
Original Size: 72.8 GB
Repack Size: 22.7 GB

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x / KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • FreeTorrents
  • Tapochek.net [magnet]
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: MegaUp (Uploaded by Sylvano, NOT compatible with other mirrors)
  • Filehoster: Upera (Uploaded by Nice_2000, NOT compatible with other mirrors)
  • Filehoster: WorldSrc [Single Direct Link] (Upto 100MB/s, NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Hitman-CPY ISO release: cpy-h47.iso (68,135,206,912 bytes)
  • Hitman.Update.v1.13.1.PLAZA (9.3 GB) & Hitman v1.13.2.Update (34 MB) applied over
  • Professional mode/weapons/items/outfits unlocker is available either during installation or after it in the “Unlocker” folder
  • Alternative SSE crack is available in NoDVD folder after installation
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • Bonus content (The Making of HITMAN Documentary / https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O0SWaGIio_U and MP3 OST) ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 72.8 to 22.7 GB)
  • Installation takes from 15 minutes (on SSD) up to 40 minutes (on HDD)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 66 GB (up to 89 GB during installation)
  • Language can be changed in game options
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Become the master assassin in an intense spy-thriller story across a world of assassination.
Travel the world from France, Italy & Morocco to Thailand, USA & Japan to take out powerful, high-profile targets.

  • Complete freedom of approach in expansive freeform classic HITMAN levels
  • 100+ hours of gameplay will challenge the creativity of all assassins
  • Create your own hits and compete with other assassins in Contracts mode

What’s new in GoTY?

https://www.ioi.dk/hitman-goty-release-notes/

This repack is NOT backwards compatible with my previous repacks.
